main event: An object was observed showing characteristics far beyond those of commercial aircraft, including hovering and bright lights, on 8 March 1963.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 55 minutes,The radar indicated the object was approximately 6 miles east of Kennedy Airport,The object shifted from flying to appearing stationary,The lights were compared to a DC-4,The report concluded that the object did not present a security threat to the U.S.
sighted object: a bright light hovering at 15-20,000 feet
